content: +++http://voices.washingtonpost.com/capitol-briefing/2009/05/cia_says_pelosi_was_briefed_on.html Intelligence officials released documents this evening saying that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) was briefed in September 2002 about the use of harsh interrogation tactics against al-Qaeda prisoners, seemingly contradicting her repeated statements over the past 18 months that she was never told that these techniques were actually being used. In a 10-page memo outlining an almost seven-year history of classified briefings, intelligence officials said that Pelosi and then-Rep. Porter Goss (R-Fla.) were the first two members of Congress ever briefed on the interrogation tactics. Then the ranking member and chairman of the House Intelligence Committee, respectively, Pelosi and Goss were briefed Sept. 4, 2002, one week before the first anniversary of the 9/11 terrorist attacks.
reply: +++http://voices.washingtonpost.com/capitol-briefing/2009/05/cia_says_pelosi_was_briefed_on.html Intelligence officials released documents this evening saying that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) was briefed in September 2002 about the use of harsh interrogation tactics against al-Qaeda prisoners, seemingly contradicting her repeated statements over the past 18 months that she was never told that these techniques were actually being used. Porter Goss (R-Fla.) were the first two members of Congress ever briefed on the interrogation tactics. Then the ranking member and chairman of the House Intelligence Committee, respectively, Pelosi and Goss were briefed Sept. 4, 2002, one week before the first anniversary of the 9/11 terrorist attacks.

content: The people in the Office of the Director of National Intelligence are just reporting to Congress what they have in the notes of each meeting. Not telling the truth in such a report would be a crime. They have no reason to lie. Nancy on the other hand has plenty of reasons to lie about what she was told in the meeting. If she was briefed on how Abu Zubaydah was tortured and said nothing, there is nothing wrong with that – no one is allowed to discuss anything that is presented in those meetings. It’s the cover up that gets people in trouble. Too bad a politician lying to the American public is not a crime. Much better leadership is needed in Congress.

content: If leadership is supposed to be a reflection of the people, then al-Qaeda should be encouraged. Pelosi and fellow hypocrites would have published the names of those involved with the procedures just as they did “deliberately” denigrating our soldiers (the SS according to Durbin) in Abu Garb… They don’t care who they destroy or how many lives lost on their intoxicated obsession for power. The dog & pony show put on by the senate – lambasting those they grilled about the events and taking every opportunity to use the media – re-publicize the pictures – turning those poor humiliated terrorists into poster children – printing the pictures on milk-cartons for donations – posting their horrific stories on Amber Alerts – talk shows – news – Jerry Springer on the Senate floor… Oh, and looky here – THOSE same LIARS we condoning the tortures – and thought they could hide behind the security clearances… Kind-a makes one wonder about all those documents found that were quickly removed from the internet BY PELOSI – what else is she HIDING from the American people – what is on those documents – who is cherry picking them – making sure only certain ones are translated and made public…? ---------snip------------------- In an interview with Fox News Sunday with Chris Wallace, Nancy Pelosi said she’s opened to launching an investigation and possible prosecution against George Bush, unlike Barack Obama who claims he prefers to “move on.” Hey, at least Obama is being honest. “I think we have to learn from the past and we cannot let the politicizing of, for example, the Justice Department to go unreviewed,” said Pelosi, . “The past is prologue, we learn from it… I want to see the truth come forth.” Pelosi continued: “I think you look at each item and see what is a violation of the law and do we even have a right to ignore it.” “We have a contempt of Congress against members of the executive branch who withheld information from us.” ------end snip---------------- Obama is no different – he is blatantly LYING about the reports – cherry-picking specific sections to deliberately skew the truth even when his own personnel said the procedures were very successful for obtaining vital information. He is a manipulative LIAR – transparency – funny, isn’t it – democrats never seem to change… Transparency = synonymous with two-way mirror… the progressive socialist definition I guess..?
